version_description: Bug fixes. Fixes login crash for iPad.
Bug fixes. Fixes login crash for iPad.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
Introducing Apple Pay! You may now buy a domain directly from the search screen. Quick. Easy.
Introducing Apple Pay! You may now buy a domain directly from the search screen. Quick. Easy.

- New menu design
- Premium domain support
- Easy login for users with Password Managers (i.e. LastPass, 1Password)
- Overall stability and performance

Make sure you grab this update and if you like it, we'd love it if you left a review in

- New menu design

Including many bug fixes and iPad and landscape support!
Including many bug fixes and iPad and landscape support!
Improved security measures to protect your account, bug fixes, and more!
Improved security measures to protect your account, bug fixes, and more!
Improvements to checking out, updates for iOS 10, and bug fixes.
Improvements to checking out, updates for iOS 10, and bug fixes.
Bug fixes. Issues with registering .co.uk domains have been resolved.
Bug fixes. Issues with registering .co.uk domains have been resolved.
Fixes issue with domain availability checking when viewing all TLDs in search.
Fixes issue with domain availability checking when viewing all TLDs in search.
Introducing a new search field for your account's domains. Additional bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Introducing a new search field for your account's domains. Additional bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Introducing Two-Factor Authentication via OneTouch. (2FA) You may now use your iOS device to approve and deny attempts to log in to your Namecheap account.
Introducing Two-Factor Authentication via OneTouch. (2FA) You may now use your iOS device to approve and deny attempts to log in to your Namecheap account.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements. Including fixes for iOS 11.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements. Including fixes for iOS 11.
Updated UI with Wishlist! We are bringing back the tab bar UI in order to improve the overall experience of the app going forward.
Updated UI with Wishlist! We are bringing back the tab bar UI in order to improve the overall experience of the app going forward.

Introducing two separate views for domains and transfers. Both supporting filtering and sorting. Bug fixes and performance upgrades.
